question: Analyze the social media engagement metrics of companies to understand their online presence and audience interaction trends.

subtasks.task: Retrieve social media presence data for each company including engagement counts across different platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and YouTube.
Aggregate the engagement data to identify which social media platform has the highest interaction metrics (likes, comments, shares, etc.) among companies.
Identify the companies with the highest engagement metrics and analyze their social media content strategies to see what types of content generate the most interaction.
Create a comparison report of companies based on their total engagement metrics across all social media platforms to determine the most impactful online presence.
